name: Flying Snake
desc: A flying snake is a brightly colored, winged serpent found in remote jungles. Tribespeople and cultists sometimes domesticate flying snakes to serve as messengers that deliver scrolls wrapped in their coils.

special_abilities.name: Flyby
special_abilities.desc: The snake doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage plus 7 (3d4) poison damage.
